Title: Establishes the New York state equine industry board
Summary: Establishes the New York state equine industry board, to advise and make recommendations to the state agencies on state government plans, policies and programs affecting all aspects of equine industry, and in such areas as its experience and studies may indicate to be appropriate.
LawCode: Add ยง387, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to establishing the New York state equine industry board
